import React ,{ useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; export default function Admin() { const { isstaff } = useAuth(); const [productpg, setProductpg] = useState(false); const [userpg, setUserpg] = useState(false); const [padd, setPadd] = useState(false); const [pUpdate, setPUpdate] = useState(false); const [pDelete, setPDelete] = useState(false); const [pname,setPname]=useState(); const [pdec,setPdec]=useState(); const [pprice,setPprice]=useState(); const [pcato,setPcato]=useState(); const [pim,setPim]=useState(); const [pimi,setPimi]=useState(); const [pimii,setPimii]=useState(); const [pimiii,setPimiii]=useState(); const [psale, setPsale] = useState(false); const [pfea, setPfea] = useState(false); const [pdis,setPdis]=useState(); const productchange =()=>{ setProductpg(true) setUserpg(false) } const userchange =()=>{ setProductpg(false) setUserpg(true) } const handleProductpost =()=>{ const client = axios.create({ baseURL: 'http://127.0.0.1:8000', }); const data ={ "name": pname, "price": pprice, "dec": pdec, "image": pim, "imageone": pimi, "imagetwo": pimii, "imagethree": pimiii, "cato": pcato, "sale": psale, "discount": pdis, "size":"x", "rating":5 } console.log('dtataa',data); client.post('/api/product/', data) setProductpg(false) } console.log(isstaff); return( <> {isstaff ?(<>
